attributes.action: Reduce household income required for loved ones to join families on a visa
attributes.additional_details:
We are wanting the government to lower the household income that is required for our fiances, spouses or family members to be able to join us on a visa. Asking for way above the national minimum wage is highly unlikely for many families. Many people are suffering for this and are being separated from their loved ones.

We just want to be whole families and not have to be separated.
